data.name: DescriptionViewAccessGroup
data.value: This permission allows you to see an access group.

data.name: DescriptionAddAccessGroup
data.value: This permission allows you to add a new access group.

data.value: This permission allows you to edit an access group information.

data.name: DescriptionDeleteAccessGroup
data.value: This permission allows you to delete an access group.

data.value: This permission allows you to assign doors to an access group.

data.value: This permission allows you to see an account information.

data.value: This permission allows you to edit an account information.

data.value: This permission allows you to delete an account.

data.value: This permission allows you to see the attendance of employee.

data.value: This permission allows you to export the attendance record to file.

data.value: This permission allows you to assign door(s) to building.

data.value: This permission allows you to see the event logs on report page.

data.value: This permission allows you to export the event logs to a file on report page.

data.value: This permission allows you to see a list of user. It is also used to see a list of users on the 'Accessible Door' page.

data.value: This permission allows you to add a new user.

data.name: DescriptionEditUser
data.value: This permission allows you to edit users.

data.name: DescriptionDeleteUser
data.value: This permission allows you to delete users.

data.value: This permission allows you to edit a working type.

data.name: DescriptionViewVisit
data.value: This permission allows you to see visitor data.

data.value: This permission allows you to apply for a visit.

data.value: This permission allows you to edit visitor information.

data.value: This permission allows you to delete a visit application only if you have applied for it.

data.value: This permission allows you to export visitor data to a file.

data.value: This permission allows you to retrieve a visitor's card.

data.value: This permission allows you to see a history of visitor.

data.value: This permission allows you to assign doors to visitor.

data.value: This permission allows you to apply for a visit to army.

data.name: DescriptionViewMonitoring
data.value: This permission allows you can see events are posted in real time.

data.name: ViewDeviceMonitoring
data.value: View the contents of the device monitoring page

data.name: DescriptionViewDeviceMonitoring
data.value: This permission allows you to see the contents of the device monitoring page.

data.name: DescriptionSendInstructionDeviceMonitoring
data.value: This permission allows you to send several instructions to devices. The instructions include 'Open door', 'Restart device' and 'Send current time'.

data.name: ViewUserDepartment
data.value: View a list of users belonging to a department

data.name: DescriptionViewUserDepartment
data.value: This permission allows you to see a list of users belonging to a particular department.

data.name: ExportUser
data.value: Export a list of users to a file

data.name: DescriptionExportUser
data.value: This permission allows you to exort and save user lists in file form.

data.name: DescriptionSetWorkingTimeUser
data.value: This permission allows you to set the working hours for each user.

data.name: ViewDeviceSetting
data.value: View the contents of the device setting page

data.name: DescriptionViewDeviceSetting
data.value: This permission allows you to see the contents of the device setting page. It is also used to see a list of devices on the 'Registered user' page.

data.name: DescriptionEditDeviceSetting
data.value: This permission allows you to edit a device information. You can edit device information from the Monitoring, Device Monitoring and Device Setting page with this permission.

data.name: DescriptionCopyDeviceSetting
data.value: This permission allows you to copy specific device settings and paste it to other devices.

data.name: DescriptionReinstallDeviceSetting
data.value: This permission allows you to reinstall the device.

data.name: DescriptionViewHistoryDeviceSetting
data.value: This permission allows you to see device history. You can also see the device history on the device monitoring page.

data.name: ViewReport
data.value: View only your own events on the Reports page

data.name: DescriptionViewReport
data.value: This permission allows you to search and view only your own past access history on the Report page.

data.name: DescriptionExportReport
data.value: This permission allows you to export the access records to a file.

data.name: ViewAccessibleDoor
data.value: View a list of accessible door

data.name: ExportAccessibleDoor
data.value: Export a list of accessible devices

data.value: This permission allows you to see a list of devices that are accessible to each user.

data.name: DescriptionExportAccessibleDoor
data.value: This permission allows you to export a list of devices that are accessible to each user to a file.
